text: “ ‘Ka jopinyno obiro e nyim Jehova Nyasaye e kinde mag sewni moyier, ngʼato angʼata modonjo koluwo rangach man yo nyandwat mondo olem nyaka wuog koluwo rangach man yo milambo; to ngʼato angʼata modonjo gi rangach ma yo milambo nyaka wuogi gi rangach ma yo nyandwat. Ok oyiene ngʼato angʼata dok koluwo rangach mane odonjogo, to ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka wuog oko koluwo rangach mangʼiyore gi mano mane odonjogo.
